item.title: Announcing Wio: A clone of Plan 9's Rio for Wayland
item.description:
For a few hours here and there over the past few months, I’ve been working on a side project: Wio. I’ll just let the (3 minute) screencast do the talking first:
Note: this video begins with several seconds of grey video. This is normal. In short, Wio is a Wayland compositor based on wlroots which has a similar look and feel to Plan 9’s Rio desktop. It works by running each application in its own nested Wayland compositor, based on Cage - yet another wlroots-based Wayland compositor.
